column4: so should i nuke all those folders ? just to be sure: ~/.compiz, ~/.config/compiz, ~./config/compiz-1, ~./gconf, ~./gconfd
ok... i'll leave the gconf ones out of it then. what will hapen when i reboot and it doesn't find any conf files?
but for example, which gui will it boot me into?
/etc/skel contains a skeleton of those files, and copies them over if it fails to find them
